## Model Classes & Enums

These are the data classes and enumerations used for configuration.

#### ::: pictex.LinearGradient
    options:
      filters:
        - "!apply_to_paint"
#### ::: pictex.SolidColor
    options:
      filters:
        - "!apply_to_paint"
        - "!_from_hex"
